author: andschwa
body: Current logic changed the indentation of the entire body, which necessarily touches many LOC. Should instead be if  !HasSupport      return  , leaving the rest of the body at the original indentation. VSO create date - 9/1/2015 14:56:00     VSO closed date - 9/4/2015 14:09:00
title: monad Utils.cs: fix up if (Platform.HasGroupPolicySupport())
